name: zubibu
overview:
zubibu creates mobile version of an online shops supporting entire checkout process.

zubibu is a SaaS solution that allows online shop owners to get a fully functioning mobile version of their website in few simple steps.

zubibu works with every e-commerce platform, including MagentoGo, Shopify, Volusion, BigCommerce, but also supports platform-independent online shops. So we can say that zubibu works with every shop.

zubibu shops are integrated with mobile payment systems including PayPal. It also supports 25 language versions e.g. Spanish, Russian and Chinese

zubibu.com makes each online shop mobile-friendly, easy for customers to browse, navigate, select merchandise and purchase from any smartphone. It reduces number of steps needed to complete transaction to improve conversion rate.
